title: Upholstery Textile, 1910
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: plain compound satin on twill ground
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Vertical panel of gray weft twill with a design in yellow twill and beige satin. Design consists of a central lyre resting on clouds with a column of laurel leaves and ivy rising from it. Maiden trumpeter in classic robes seated at either side of the lyre. Names "J.S. Bach" and "Mozart" on upper left and right. "Beethoven" and "Wagner" on lower left and right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Upholstery Textile, 1910.
1910. Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: plain compound satin on twill ground. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-74.
